segments.text: This kitchen scene is unfolding right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, looking every bit the busy mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the basin and soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her shoe is wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is stretching way too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like the stool is tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and hurt himself any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the mom turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
